trans-unit.source: Defines partial-trust access to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 定義 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> 類別的部分定義存取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission> class defines access to the following methods on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission>類別上會定義下列方法存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> to request.
trans-unit.target: 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />。

trans-unit.source: Only <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None" /> are valid.
trans-unit.target: 只有 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None" /> 有效。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is not a valid permission state.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 不是有效的使用權限狀態。

trans-unit.source: Only <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None" /> are valid.
trans-unit.target: 只有 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None" /> 有效。

trans-unit.source: The permission flags to request.
trans-unit.target: 要求的權限旗標。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission" /> class with the specified permission flags.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定權限旗標，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a derived class, creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別實作時，建立並傳回目前權限物件的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前權限物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermissionFlags" /> for the type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定型別描述元的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermissionFlags" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermissionFlags" /> for the type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 型別描述元的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermissionFlags" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，透過 XML 編碼方式，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a derived class, creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別實作時，建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a derived class, determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生類別實作時，會判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the type descriptor may be called from partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否可以透過部分信任程式碼來呼叫型別描述元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission.Flags" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermissionFlags.RestrictedRegistrationAccess" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermission.Flags" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.TypeDescriptorPermissionFlags.RestrictedRegistrationAccess" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立安全性物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。
